All Classes

Class Description
Baron
This class extends the card class to implement the play method and to represent and define the logic of the baron card in the game.
Card
Represents a general card, its functions and its properties.
ChatApp
Launches the JavaFX Application
ChatServer
Holds a pool of UserThreads, provides methods for broadcasting to single user or all users Holds the game-object, provides methods for interacting with the game.
ChatView
This class is the controller class for the fxml file and it represents the chat window.
ChatViewViewModel
View Model for the ChatView sets up and starts the Client successfully constructed in WelcomeView.
Client
This class implements the runnable interface and it represents the client in the Server.
Countess
This class extends the Card class to implement the play method.
DuplicateNameException
Simple Exception that is thrown if user tries to choose a name that is already taken.
EditDistance
Simple implementation of Edit-Distance to provide suggestions to the users regarding the game commands Used as static method in UserThread to generate a more customized default answer from server to unknown command.
Game
Represents the "Game".
Guard
Represents the Guard Card and implements the action when it's played.
Handmaid
Represents the the Handmaid Card and implements the action when it's played.
King
Implementation of the card King
Player
Represents a Player.
Priest
This class is responsible to represent, define, and implement the logic of the Priest card in the game.
Prince
Implementation of the card Prince
Princess
This class is responsible to represent, define, and implement the logic of the Princess card in the game.
UserThread
Handles the Client-Threads from the Server-side.
WelcomeView
This class initializes the welcome window with user registration
WelcomeViewViewModel
View Model for the initial Welcome Screen.
